meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: Penicillin–Streptomycin 100X: 10,000 units/mL Penicillin and 10,000 µg/mL Streptomycin, sterile-filtered, ready for cell culture to effectively suppress bacterial contamination.

product.name: Penicillin–Streptomycin 100X (Dual Antibiotic)
product.intro: Contains 10,000 units/mL Penicillin and 10,000 µg/mL Streptomycin. Sterile-filtered and ready to use in cell culture to prevent and control bacterial contamination.
